TopicTitle: The shared .23 release features news thread.

Articles.Content:
Optimizations....

Now everybody can fly the MunBug!

Huzzah!! I can increase the part count again

No, as far as I know Kerbal EVA has it's own resource: EVA Propellant.

This sounds like it was a very recent change, so I would expect the whole command pod mono-propellant thing might change as well.

Maybe they'll put EVA propellant in the command pod, or maybe not. In the videos I saw, the command pods did have a small amount of mono-propellant, the one-man cockpit had 7.5L I think.

Maybe they'll put EVA propellant in the command pod, or maybe not.

At the very least I'm hoping for a small, stock "EVA Propellant" tank to let us resupply distant bases. If not this release, then in the next few. (Though this is something easy to do with a simple part cfg edit, or with something a bit more complex like Modular Fuels.)
I also noticed that you can now tweak a control surface to only respond to a combination of roll, pitch, and yaw inputs. Proper ailerons and rudders, here we come!
Well I think this thread will be dead before long, just because 0.23 is coming in TWO DAYS!
ya the best thread I ever started dies in two days, I only bumped it because it looked like some other threads about the same topic where starting to show up.
What sucks is I got no rep for it what so ever o well life is life now its turning in to a chat.

What sucks is I got no rep for it what so ever o well life is life now its turning in to a chat.

There you go. For keeping us informed.
No worries! Added rep, not everyone would have kept us up to speed if it wasn't for this thread. But mods will probably close this soon as its getting a bit off topic.

No worries! Added rep, not everyone would have kept us up to speed if it wasn't for this thread. But mods will probably close this soon as its getting a bit off topic.

True

But anyways thank you all for your hospitality and may the rep flow like a river for all of you in the future!
Hey mods! Mods! Over here... We derailed this thread completly! Lock er' up!

Guys, can we get back on topic please?

Thanks

I told you it was coming!

Anyway on topic... How efficient will the SABRE auto switching be?

I told you it was coming!

Anyway on topic... How efficient will the SABRE auto switching be?

From the twitch demo that I saw, live, the RAPIER automatically switches when a flame-out would occur - instead of a flame-out, (which often causes uncontrollable yaw) it switches to rocket mode.

Is it possible to fill Mk3 Fuselage with fuel+oxidizer in order to build an SSTO?

At the present stage you can not alter the types of fuel a tank is designed to hold, nor with fuel and ox can you reduce one type to increase the other.
